discourse_list.title: Use of DAI in Polygon (formerly MATIC)

content.content: Use of DAI in Polygon (formerly MATIC) With the growing use of DAI in Polygon and the incorporation of the Aave protocol and Pooltogether, does MakerDAO plan to take advantage of the use cases of this sidechain network? Several members of our DAG Venezuela and our community in Venezuela have switched to this network to take advantage of its DeFi benefits. I myself use both protocols in this network with DAI. On our part we have to create tutorials and communication with our community to not miss this excellent tool.
